article.headline: Holy Cross 61, Navy 42
article.story: WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) -- Keith Simmons scored 22 points to lead Holy Cross to a 61-42 victory over Navy on Wednesday night. Simmons teamed with Torey Thomas to ignite a decisive 15-2 run in the second half to lift the Crusaders (13-6, 4-0 Patriot League) to their sixth straight win. Adam Teague scored 17 points for Navy (11-8, 1-3). The Crusaders led 20-19 at halftime after being held to just 28 percent shooting from the field. In the second half, Thomas made two free throws after a steal and assisted on three straight fast-break baskets. Alex Vander Baan (13 points) scored a pair of field goals and Simmons contributed three more foul shots, which gave Holy Cross a 32-19 lead. After Navy was held scoreless for nearly eight minutes at the end of the first half and the beginning of the second, Teague scored to make it 32-21 with 15:05 left. Simmons then hit a 3-pointer and moments later scored on an electrifying dunk. Pat Doherty added three more points to extend the Crusaders' lead to 45-31. After another field goal by Teague, Simmons scored a jumper to give Holy Cross an uinsurmountable 50-33 advantage with 5:50 left.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
